description: Every time a new contact is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add a new contact to E-goi . The template uses [this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1CH4W-pZ26UwuGjjGS0Zz29FboziVyMDuyHpYIrGJ1DA/edit?usp=sharing)
